<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_request">null<item endquery="false" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Validate Leave Balance</name><order>47</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
    try {
        // Skip if this is a status change (handled by status change rule)
        if (previous && current.status != previous.status) {
            return;
        }

        // Basic validation
        if (!current.requested_by) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Requester information is missing');
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            return;
        }

        if (!current.leave_type) {
            gs.addErrorMessage('Please select a leave type');
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            return;
        }

        // Get year from start date or use current year
        var year = current.start_date ? 
            new GlideDateTime(current.start_date).getYearLocalTime() :
            new GlideDateTime().getYearLocalTime();

        // Find matching balance record
        var balanceGR = new GlideRecord('x_1800027_leve_sys_leave_balance');
        balanceGR.addQuery('employee', current.requested_by);
        balanceGR.addQuery('leave_type', current.leave_type);
        balanceGR.addQuery('year', year);
        balanceGR.query();

        if (balanceGR.next()) {
            var availableBalance = parseFloat(balanceGR.available_balance) || 0;
            var requested = parseFloat(current.duration) || 0;

            if (requested > availableBalance) {
                var msg = 'Insufficient leave balance. Available: ' +
                    availableBalance.toFixed(2) + ' days, Requested: ' + 
                    requested.toFixed(2) + ' days';
                gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
                current.setAbortAction(true);
            }
        } else {
            var msg = 'No leave balance record found for the selected leave type in ' + year;
            gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
            current.setAbortAction(true);
        }
    } catch(ex) {
        gs.error('Error in Validate Leave Balance BR: ' + ex);
        gs.addErrorMessage('An error occurred while validating leave balance');
        current.setAbortAction(true);
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-19 09:58:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8daf078ec3fea210a7f1b813e4013171</sys_id><sys_mod_count>24</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Validate Leave Balance</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Leave Management System" source="x_1800027_leve_sys">9b184465c3beaa10a7f1b813e4013155</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Leave Management System">9b184465c3beaa10a7f1b813e4013155</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_8daf078ec3fea210a7f1b813e4013171</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-20 18:05:27</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=8daf078ec3fea210a7f1b813e4013171"/></record_update>
